description: Number of labeled digraphs where every node has indegree 0 or outdegree 0 and no isolated nodes.
comments: Also labeled graphs with 2-colored nodes with no isolated nodes where black nodes are only connected to white nodes and vice versa.
formula: a(n) = Sum_{k=0..n} (-1)^(n-k)*binomial(n, k)*A001831(k)a(n) = Sum_{k=0..n} binomial(n, k)*(2^k-2)^(n-k). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Apr 04 2003
author: _Christian G. Bower_, Dec 15 1999
extensions: Last 4 terms corrected by _Vladeta Jovovic_, Apr 04 2003
